articles.author: Yaron Steinbuch
articles.title: Aussie surfers captured on video being rescued after 36 hours at sea off Indonesia - New York Post
articles.description: Dramatic video captured the moment a group of Australian surfers were found alive in the water — 36 hours after their boat capsized during bad weather off Indonesia in what had been a celebra…
